verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: MADISON] -- [ARG1: The political battle over President Donald Trump 's judicial nominees] [V: escalated] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [ARGM-TMP: when the Senate took the rare step of confirming the nomination of a Wisconsin attorney to serve as a federal judge despite the objections of one of his home - state senators] .

MADISON -- The political battle over President Donald Trump 's judicial nominees escalated [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [R-ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: the Senate] [V: took] [ARG1: the rare step of confirming the nomination of a Wisconsin attorney to serve as a federal judge despite the objections of one of his home - state senators] .

MADISON -- The political battle over President Donald Trump 's judicial nominees escalated on Thursday when [ARG0: the Senate] took the rare step of [V: confirming] [ARG1: the nomination of a Wisconsin attorney to serve as a federal judge despite the objections of one of his home - state senators] .

MADISON -- The political battle over President Donald Trump 's judicial nominees escalated on Thursday when the Senate took the rare step of confirming the nomination of [ARG0: a Wisconsin attorney] to [V: serve] [ARG1: as a federal judge] [ARGM-ADV: despite the objections of one of his home - state senators] .
